name: Sarah Johnson
summary: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Passionate about React, TypeScript, and cloud architecture. Led teams of 5-10 engineers and shipped multiple successful SaaS products.
experience:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp (2020-Present): Led the development of a React-based dashboard serving 10M+ users. Architected microservices on AWS using Node.js and PostgreSQL. 

Software Engineer at StartupXYZ (2017-2020): Built the company's main product from scratch using React, Redux, and Node.js. Grew the engineering team from 2 to 15 people.

Junior Developer at WebAgency (2015-2017): Developed client websites using modern web technologies.
education:
BS Computer Science, UC Berkeley (2011-2015)
Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Distributed Systems, Machine Learning
